import React from 'react' import InputTag from './InputTag' import { Button, Form, Grid, Header, Image, Message, Segment, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react' const RecipientInfo = ({ handleChange, handleSubmit, state, formData }) => { const inputCollection = formData.map(dataObj => < InputTag key={dataObj.name} dataObj={dataObj} handleChange={handleChange} state={state}/>) return (
CM 1500 RecipientInfo
) } export default RecipientInfo
